# Preface {-}

![ ](images/otl-cover-300x300.png)

Book-in-progress, last updated on: `r Sys.Date()`

*On The Line* makes visible the hidden boundaries that divide metropolitan Hartford, Connecticut, and tells the stories of civil rights struggles to cross over, redraw, or erase these lines in schooling and housing.
